channel.title: Machining on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Machining on Home

item.title: Machining
item.description: In the context of our manufacturing operations a milling machine and a lathe offer support. These tools empower us to adapt flexibly to the requirements of our primary welding production. Milling machine Microcut VMCA 1000 CNC Parameters Value Traverses: X: 1 000 mm, Y: 500 mm, Z: 500 mm Table: 1520 x 520 mm Spindle speed: 10 000 rpm Turning machine SA 48/1000 CNC Parameters Value Max. swing diameter, without bed bridge: 710 mm Swing diameter over bed: 475 mm Max.
